page.title: 17Local Character
page.content: Mr.Black became a gamekeeper because he liked the open-air and walking.He was born in Cottage Row and as a boy liked shooting and fishing.He goes to Auchenstroan and Craigdarroch to shoot now and often kills deer and foxes in the course of his duties.He has two dogs and a ferret which he uses for stalking hunting rabbits.He often uses a three wheel motor-bike to get around the hills as he is nearly 70 years old.His other job involves him in sweeping the streets and he has a hobby of two old cars which he races around in.
